reviews.review: Great game, fun to play with friends

I've played a lot of dead by daylight with my friends and we've all really enjoyed it and it's super fun to introduce my friends to the game after they get it. Compared to some people, I haven't played that much, but I still have so much left to do, and I look forward to it.

Apenas achei ridiculo penalizarem o usuário por ele ter saído da partida. Minha internet caiu e agora vou ficar 24 horas sem voltar pro jogo por causa disso, sendo que a culpa nem foi minha de eu ter saído, e sim da minha internet. Poderiam diminuir o tempo de penalidade pra quem saísse do jogo durante uma partida, pois as vezes a pessoa acaba saindo por culpa da conexão fraca ou outra coisa.
Um dos melhores jogos online que já vi, simplesmente viciante. Tudo fica melhor quando você joga as partidas com os amigos no Discord.

Don't bother, even if you are a big fan of horror. Not only have the execs fallen into the trap that is NFT scams, not even bothering to tell their customers what they would be purchasing until a month after the DLC was released, they continue to pile onto the game's already messy code with even more garbage. The game is poorly optimized, painfully unbalanced, and horribly misguided direction-wise. A shame, really. I invested a lot of time and money into this game, and BHVR seems dead-set on becoming the EA of indie development companies. 

Don't waste your money, don't waste your time, don't fall for the shiny licensed killers and survivors that draw people in, play something else.
best game love to play with friends

This game is AWESOME especially if you like horror games. However there are a few problems like error code 4 (i got this one its not to hard to fix) but sometimes someone can leave the match and the whole game stops i mean cant it keep going or find a new player? Apart from all the cons to this game its great but its even better with friends but i wish you could play as the killer when someone is the survivor, that would be a really cool feature. Anyway this game is fun as and almost a MUST!

Very fun to play with friends

DBD in my experience is very much a love it or hate it sort of game. What I mean by that is that either you will love the thrill of the hunt as a killer, and the adrenaline rush of out playing your hunter as a survivor, or you will find it boring/unfun. I personally delight in it.
From a design point of view it is one the better "hunter vs hunted" style games out there. However there are toxic elements for both sides. Decisive Strike (and other silly perks) for the the survivors which allows them to play as stupidly as they like and not be punished for it. Moris (and unsporting play) for the killers.
Despite these problems, I delight in playing this game, solo and with my friends. 
If you are the sort of person who needs to win most of the time, this game probably is not for you, as losing is quite easy.
However, if you are willing to lose and learn from your losses, you will enjoy this game quite a bit.
Campering and using mori is a totally valid strategy, change my mind

I haven't played many asymmetrical action games, so I cannot judge it by comparing it to others, but I can say that this game is super easy to pick up, and there is a lot of fun to be had with friends. There is a lot to learn, and this is not an easy game to master, but picking it up for the first time as a survivor is super easy; you fix the generators and avoid the bad boy.

I've started playing the killer about 50 hours in and that part of the game is COMPLETELY different. your skills as a survivor do not really carry over in my experience, but it may help you get inside the mind of the people youre trying to murder, which will help, but anyway killing is not easy. Be nice to your fellow players and dont be toxic and everyone will have a good time. The only time I dont enjoy a game isn't when I lose, its when the players are mean. 

Be nice. Have fun.

this game is bad and broken

This game stresses me out immensely and I do not enjoy playing it.
My partner plays it.
My family plays it.
My friends play it.
Curse you all. I resent every single moment I spend in this game.

To reiterate the reason for this:
I do not enjoy games where I am chased by a murderer and have no means to properly defend myself (no. Pallets do not count and flashlights and firecrackers do not either.)

This game gives me immense terror levels and to all those of you saying "its not scary at all", bare in mind that to other people it can be.

And playing as a killer is not enjoyable either. I just feel bad for the survivors knowing the feelings I had whilst playing one. It's not fun. This whole game is just bleak and unenjoyable murder porn.

That's why I don't like this game. I'm not the targeted audience. But all my friends play it so I had to try it. I don't like it.

Don't feel forced to play this if you don't enjoy it. The feedback from my friends is also a mixed bag. Many players are salty and certain killers apparently stalk survivors steam profiles to exploit people playing with friends or leave immature remarks.

Folks, don't play this.
Very good game to play with friends
